mapper.insert: insert into outpt_prescribe_temp_detail(id, hosp_code, opt_id, group_no, group_seq_no, item_code, item_id, item_name, spec, prep_code, dosage, dosage_unit_code, usage_code, rate_id, speed_code, num, unit_code, total_num, price, total_price, bfc_id, use_days, exec_dept_id, use_code, herb_note_code, is_skin, content) values (#{id}, #{hospCode}, #{optId}, #{groupNo}, #{groupSeqNo}, #{itemCode}, #{itemId}, #{itemName}, #{spec}, #{prepCode}, #{dosage}, #{dosageUnitCode}, #{usageCode}, #{rateId}, #{speedCode}, #{num}, #{unitCode}, #{totalNum}, #{price}, #{totalPrice}, #{bfcId}, #{useDays}, #{execDeptId}, #{useCode}, #{herbNoteCode}, #{isSkin}, #{content})
mapper.update:
update outpt_prescribe_temp_detail
id = #{id},
hosp_code = #{hospCode},
opt_id = #{optId},
group_no = #{groupNo},
group_seq_no = #{groupSeqNo},
item_code = #{itemCode},
item_id = #{itemId},
item_name = #{itemName},
spec = #{spec},
prep_code = #{prepCode},
dosage = #{dosage},
dosage_unit_code = #{dosageUnitCode},
usage_code = #{usageCode},
rate_id = #{rateId},
speed_code = #{speedCode},
num = #{num},
unit_code = #{unitCode},
total_num = #{totalNum},
price = #{price},
total_price = #{totalPrice},
bfc_id = #{bfcId},
use_days = #{useDays},
exec_dept_id = #{execDeptId},
use_code = #{useCode},
herb_note_code = #{herbNoteCode},
is_skin = #{isSkin},
content = #{content},
where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and id = #{id}
mapper.delete: delete from outpt_prescribe_temp_detail where hosp_code = #{hospCode} and opt_id = #{id}
